Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'The giant killer falls right in front of you, and you finally hear the long-awaited siren.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "It was an extremely dangerous night. Fortunately, it's all over—for now."}
{3: "As the narrator speaks, the killer's remains decompose into ashes and disappear in the air."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'He was a tough opponent even in here...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hmm? Something is left behind...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui reaches out into the ashes and pulls something out.'}
{3: 'It looks like a piece of metal, with some text written on it.'}
{3: 'To Camp Inferno Trainee:'}
{3: 'This is the last one, come and take it. Happy Halloween :D'}
{3: '—George Darren Toro'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"To my trainees of Camp Inferno: This is the end, come and take it. Happy Halloween :D —George Darren Toro"...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What does that mean...?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'George Darren Toro... Here he is!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla searches on her terminal and shows it to everyone with excitement.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Look! George Darren Toro was a renowned director of horror and action movies during the Golden Age. His famous works included "Hellson"", ""Oceanic Rim"...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, I love his movies! Especially when that gigantic robot punches the other gigantic monster in the face! Kaboom!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Every time I watched it, I felt like winding back that punch and watching it again 10 times! Then another 10 times at 1/10 speed!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, he also loved making the movie props as realistic as possible. Capt thinks it makes them look fake, but I love it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But... "The Darkening" wasn\'t his movie, was it?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I just searched for "Camp Inferno" in the database. It\'s a third-party funded training camp for screenwriters, and Toro was the chief instructor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I heard rumors that Toro always wrote the scripts for his own movies, then asked some random screenwriter to put their names on them. It's probably true.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This console is probably left by Toro for his students then.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ayla, what kind of place is this Camp Inferno?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm... Let me see, a total of 57 students attended the camp, but... It just ended without any notice?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Seems the project was just terminated. There was no follow-up news.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need more information...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh, this record does have a locked section that can only be unlocked after certain requirements are met.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But I haven't detected any visit logs... Which means no one else except Toro has read the content inside.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's a puzzle left by Toro! Now I'm hyped up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Kamui, let me have a look at that metal plate. Maybe I can...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla grabs the metal plate from Kamui and carefully examines it. She then turns to you, as if she has found something.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I knew this would have a secret layer.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla inserts her fingers into the secret layer and pushes the metal plate open. There is a piece of paper inside.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, all of you lose your vision. Soon, you cannot feel or hear anything either.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Certificate confirmed. Loading Stage 2.'}
